page.title: 15POLLUTION
page.content: Pollution is made by factories and people, people who throw litter into streams and rivers, are gradually killing off all life in them. The River Thames was highly polluted because of all the factories along side of it. Factories churn out waste in two forms, one is into the air, and the other and most serious one is into the water, it not only destroys life but creates a disgusting smell and a substance called "scum". Petrol fumes from cars and other traffic pollute the atmosphere, as do aerosole cans which destroy the ozone layers. But now people are tring to clean the atmosphere up, and over the last 50 years the River Thames has got a lot cleaner and less polluted.
